results.message: Check that the title element describes the document.

This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 7:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2:1. Recommendation: change text colour to #005a70.
Check that text of the link describes the purpose of the link.

Img element is marked so that it is ignored by Assistive Technology.
If this image cannot be fully described in a short text alternative, ensure a long text alternative is also available, such as in the body text or through a link.
Check that this element has an inherited background colour or image to complement the corresponding inline foreground colour.
This element is absolutely positioned and the background color can not be determined. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the background are at least 7:1.

Check that text of the link describes the purpose of the link.
Check that this link's link text contains information indicating that the link will open in a new window.

This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 7:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.51:1. Recommendation: change text colour to #0053c0.
Check that a change of context does not occur when this input field receives focus.
